speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0391/2007 ) by Sahra Wagenknecht, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on the contribution of taxation and customs policies to the Lisbon Strategy ( 2007/2097(INI) ).
original: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0391/2007 ) by Sahra Wagenknecht, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on the contribution of taxation and customs policies to the Lisbon Strategy ( 2007/2097(INI) ).
agenda_item: Taxation and customs policies and the Lisbon Strategy (debate)
